Name: Wooden mummy label of Psais (?)
Description: Wooden mummy label, with a hole at one end for tying to the body. One side is inscribed with the name of the deceased in Demotic, the other side in Greek.Label reads: In Greek: 'Psais, son of Besis, whose mother was Thnesios from Psonis; He lived 40 years'In Demotic: The same as above repeated with a prayer commending the soul to Osiris, Sokaris, etc.
